Just downloaded. This copy is watchable on computer monitor, dont know how is it on big TV screen though.  Definitely better then NoGRP

While technically lower quality it is better than NoGrp or FinireDH.  The Web PreAir is not in full 1080p, the original source is at best 720p and probably a bit lower than that.  NoGrp and FinireDH are simply taking the resolution of this video and upsizing it.  This will look better than a hard encoded upsizing because the scaling of most TVs is far more advanced than software scaling on low end machines.
